text: Tie-dye is a colorful pattern used on clothing. It is made by tying a piece of clothing into a tight bundle, and then dyeing it with various colors. This became very popular in the 1960s and '70s. It was often made to represent signs like 'peace' and 'flower power'. Tie dye is an expression of emotion and is a very colourful and expressive type of art. Category:Cloth Category:Textile arts
title: Tie-dye
